flavor_text: They fly around at high speed striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble they face opponents bravely.
These Pokemon evolve by wearing the shell covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects their whole body.
Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
